name: In Arcem Miseria
description:
The Synopsis
You awaken after a dream in front of a giant tower.
What mysteries lie within?
Why are you here?

Could this place be the tower young Benjamin's grandfather told him about years ago?

The Characters
Benjamin: The young boy who awakens in front of the tower.
Sonellia: A young girl he encounters at the gates of the tower.

Gameplay
- Top-down style camera and point-and-click movement and combat controls.
- Controls each character separately and use this to solve puzzles.
- Steampunk-style 3D environment.
- Combat similar to games like Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights
